mapper.sql: ORDER_ID, ORDER_NO, CREATE_TIME, USER_NAME, MOBILE, IDENT_CARD, USER_SEX, MARRY_STS, PRODUCT_NAME, TOTAL_AMOUNT, TOTAL_PERIODS, PERIODS_AMOUNT, PRACTICAL_LOAN, BANK_PRACTICAL_PERIODS, PRACTICAL_LOAN_DATE, REAL_MONTHLY_INTEREST_RATE, TOTAL_LOAN_INTEREST, MANA_NAME, MANA_TEL, APPROVAL_STS, ORDER_STS
mapper.insert: insert into EP_DAT_REPORT (ORDER_ID, ORDER_NO, CREATE_TIME, USER_NAME, MOBILE, IDENT_CARD, USER_SEX, MARRY_STS, PRODUCT_NAME, TOTAL_AMOUNT, TOTAL_PERIODS, PERIODS_AMOUNT, PRACTICAL_LOAN, BANK_PRACTICAL_PERIODS, PRACTICAL_LOAN_DATE, REAL_MONTHLY_INTEREST_RATE, TOTAL_LOAN_INTEREST, MANA_NAME, MANA_TEL, APPROVAL_STS, ORDER_STS) SELECT a.ORDER_ID, a.ORDER_NO, a.CREATE_TIME, c.USER_NAME, c.MOBILE, c.IDENT_CARD, c.USER_SEX, c.MARRY_STS, b.PRODUCT_NAME, a.TOTAL_AMOUNT, a.TOTAL_PERIODS, a.PERIODS_AMOUNT, a.PRACTICAL_LOAN, a.BANK_PRACTICAL_PERIODS, a.PRACTICAL_LOAN_DATE, a.REAL_MONTHLY_INTEREST_RATE, a.TOTAL_LOAN_INTEREST, d.MANA_NAME, d.MANA_TEL, a.APPROVAL_STS, a.ORDER_STS FROM EP_DAT_ORDER a LEFT JOIN EP_CFG_PRODUCT b ON a.PRODUCT_ID = b.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN EP_CFG_CLIENT_MANAGE c ON a.CLIENT_ID = c.ID LEFT JOIN EP_CFG_CREDIT_MANAGER d ON a.CREDIT_MANAGER_ID = d.CREDIT_MANAGER_ID WHERE a.IS_VALID = 1

insert into EP_DAT_REPORT (ORDER_ID, ORDER_NO, CREATE_TIME, USER_NAME, MOBILE, IDENT_CARD, USER_SEX, MARRY_STS, PRODUCT_NAME, TOTAL_AMOUNT, TOTAL_PERIODS, PERIODS_AMOUNT, PRACTICAL_LOAN, BANK_PRACTICAL_PERIODS, PRACTICAL_LOAN_DATE, REAL_MONTHLY_INTEREST_RATE, TOTAL_LOAN_INTEREST, MANA_NAME, MANA_TEL, APPROVAL_STS, ORDER_STS) SELECT a.ORDER_ID, a.ORDER_NO, a.CREATE_TIME, c.USER_NAME, c.MOBILE, c.IDENT_CARD, c.USER_SEX, c.MARRY_STS, b.PRODUCT_NAME, a.TOTAL_AMOUNT, a.TOTAL_PERIODS, a.PERIODS_AMOUNT, a.PRACTICAL_LOAN, a.BANK_PRACTICAL_PERIODS, a.PRACTICAL_LOAN_DATE, a.REAL_MONTHLY_INTEREST_RATE, a.TOTAL_LOAN_INTEREST, d.MANA_NAME, d.MANA_TEL, a.APPROVAL_STS, a.ORDER_STS FROM EP_DAT_ORDER a LEFT JOIN EP_CFG_PRODUCT b ON a.PRODUCT_ID = b.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN EP_CFG_CLIENT_MANAGE c ON a.CLIENT_ID = c.ID LEFT JOIN EP_CFG_CREDIT_MANAGER d ON a.CREDIT_MANAGER_ID = d.CREDIT_MANAGER_ID WHERE a.IS_VALID = 1 and a.CREATE_TIME > (select max(e.CREATE_TIME) from EP_DAT_REPORT e)
